long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Black Turn Chrome Extension brings you one step closer to seamless music distribution. With a single click, open The Black Turn website - India's leading music distribution platform, empowering independent artists and record labels to share their music globally. Whether you're an artist looking to get your songs on top music platforms like Apple Music, Spotify, Gaana, or want to protect your content with copyright solutions, The Black Turn is here for you.

Features:

Quick and easy access to The Black Turn website.
Bookmark The Black Turn directly from your Chrome browser for instant access.
Ideal for artists, producers, and music industry professionals who want to distribute and protect their music content.
Why Use The Black Turn: The Black Turn helps you distribute your music on major digital platforms effortlessly, providing copyright protection and ensuring your music reaches audiences worldwide. This extension makes it even easier to reach our website and begin your distribution journey.

Click the extension icon, and youâ€™re immediately taken to our platform where you can start uploading, managing, and distributing your music.
